remarks: Value of a univariate polynomial evaluation mapping the exponentiation of a variable to the exponentiation of the evaluated variable. (Contributed by AV, 14-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evl1varpw.q $e |- Q = ( eval1 ` R ) $.
evl1varpw.w $e |- W = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
evl1varpw.g $e |- G = ( mulGrp ` W ) $.
evl1varpw.x $e |- X = ( var1 ` R ) $.
evl1varpw.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
evl1varpw.e $e |- .^ = ( .g ` G ) $.
evl1varpw.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) $.
evl1varpw.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
evl1varpwval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. B ) $.
evl1varpwval.h $e |- H = ( mulGrp ` R ) $.
evl1varpwval.e $e |- E = ( .g ` H ) $.
evl1varpwval $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Q ` ( N .^ X ) ) ` C ) = ( N E C ) ) $.
